feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.9°C

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then clearing. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
